title: 该行报错如何解决
author: _king_j
txt_content:
TP] 加载配置文件中
[09:51:54 ERROR]: [WTP] Cannot load configuration from jar
org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException: unacceptable character '?' (0xFFFD) special characters are not allowed
in "<string>", position 29

似乎好几个插件都是如此

replies.author: kj415j45
replies.txt_content: 你的文件(夹)名中有非法字符(中文?)

replies.author: _king_j
replies.txt_content:
kj415j45 发表于 2017-3-12 10:29
你的文件(夹)名中有非法字符(中文?)
怎么解决。。

replies.author: kj415j45
replies.txt_content:
_king_j 发表于 2017-3-13 23:29
怎么解决。。
把你的游戏文件夹移动到根目录(最快)
或者重命名你的游戏文件夹

replies.author: _king_j
replies.txt_content:
kj415j45 发表于 2017-3-18 20:19
把你的游戏文件夹移动到根目录(最快)
或者重命名你的游戏文件夹
我是vps，我弄在了/mc文件夹
